results.content:
The course is a good introduction to React.js, however it is far away from actually talking about workng project. Also, many topics are un-necesaarily made complex by re-writing the code, for eg, once you wrote the components using functions, and then in the same lesson, changed it to classes. WHich is stupid, because you can jump esily between two, I cannot.
Please keep it simple and short.
results.content_html:
The course is a good introduction to React.js, however it is far away from actually talking about workng project. Also, many topics are un-necesaarily made complex by re-writing the code, for eg, once you wrote the components using functions, and then in the same lesson, changed it to classes. WHich is stupid, because you can jump esily between two, I cannot.
Please keep it simple and short.

results.content: The trainer is very intelligent and full of resources. I have completed 51% of the course so far and I must say that I haven't ever felt unconnected with the content being delivered. I would highly recommend this course to anyone who is looking to start from scratch in React. Though it would be great if you already know basics of HTML & CSS before joining the course :)
results.content_html: The trainer is very intelligent and full of resources. I have completed 51% of the course so far and I must say that I haven't ever felt unconnected with the content being delivered. I would highly recommend this course to anyone who is looking to start from scratch in React. Though it would be great if you already know basics of HTML & CSS before joining the course :)

results.content: Good course, although the audio quality wasn't the best tbh, and it was quite brief, it could have gone deeper into the React framework. Nevertheless, I appreciate the effort and I gained a lot of knowledge about the basics of the library.

results.content: Der Titel mit  "Advanced 2021" ist übertrieben. Neuere Best Practices bspw.  Hooks werden nicht angesprochen. Auch advanced ist deutlich übertrieben.  Zu Advanced gerade wenn er am Anfang SPA erwähnt, sollte mindestens noch Routing beinhalten. Globales Statehandling wird ebenfalls nicht behandelt. Allem in allem ein vernünftiges, älteres Beginner Tutorial für React. Von Advanced oder '2021' jedoch keine Spur.
results.content_html: Der Titel mit "Advanced 2021" ist übertrieben. Neuere Best Practices bspw. Hooks werden nicht angesprochen. Auch advanced ist deutlich übertrieben. Zu Advanced gerade wenn er am Anfang SPA erwähnt, sollte mindestens noch Routing beinhalten. Globales Statehandling wird ebenfalls nicht behandelt. Allem in allem ein vernünftiges, älteres Beginner Tutorial für React. Von Advanced oder '2021' jedoch keine Spur.
